channel.title: John Mantios fyi
channel.description: Recent content on John Mantios fyi

item.title: Change Data Capture, Debezium and dangerous database cleanups
item.description: Introduction I have been wondering for a while what my second blog post’s topic would be about. Where would I get inspiration from? And then it dawned on me… I have an actual day job I can use for inspiration! I am going to write about the process of archiving data from a relational database in which I have enabled Change Data Capture through Debezium. Context Lately I have been developing a full stack application which is powered by a relational database.

item.title: My First Blogpost: setting up my own blog
item.description: Introduction I finally gave in to the FOMO of having my own blog. Things I like in blogs: No one can comment. Having my own blog was something that I had in my TODO list for quite a while. Deciding on the content though is of course a task of its own. And because I am lazy, this first blog post is going to be about how I set up this blog!
